headline: Sentiment down 818% this week, optimism declining
key_insights: Fears trending up 414% over 7 days (strong momentum)
Alert: Overall sentiment has significantly decreased (z=-2.04)
sentiment_commentary:
• Frustrations explode with 149 quotes and 117 at strong intensity - people are extremely agitated and venting heavily today.

• This hits the highest frustration level in the 44-day period, nearly doubling from yesterday's already elevated score.

• Fears also spiked dramatically from yesterday while optimism remains deeply negative despite a small recovery.
methodology: See METHODOLOGY.md. Scores use z-score normalization with empirically-derived intensity weights from analytics_config.yaml. Alerts at |z| >= threshold (configurable, default 2.0 for p < 0.05).
